name: LoFi Virtual Museum
description:
I missed museums and other public spaces after a year of COVID, so I made a virtual museum using pieces from the Seattle Art Museum's website. Enjoy a relaxing space to appreciate art in.

Movement Controls: WASD or Mouse Click
Camera Controls: QE
Interact with Art: Space or Mouse Click

Made in RPG Maker MV using the MV3D plugin https://cutievirus.itch.io/mv3d
Art on display taken from the SAM online collections http://art.seattleartmuseum.org/collections
Music by Stevia Sphere https://steviasphere.bandcamp.com/
